ygData.messageBody:
I whole heartedly agree with you wayne.

The game is about balance. Some people are saying that a group of really
high levels do not need warriors. I say thats BS my friends always want my
warrior in their group. Not just becuase im company mind you. Because they
are spell casters. If im not there, the MOB would latch onto them and
interrupt their casting.

Sure we could beg verant for one more skill .... critical hit , which is a
very good idea. And i like the idea of it being like ripsote and parry.
Makes more sense. But the fact of the matter is this: We are there to
prevent our spellcasting buddies from being hit by creatures so that THEY
can dish out the damage. I have never had anyone complain to me and say look
man we dont want you in the group anymore cause you doont dish out the most
damage.

Every group needs a good strong warrior.

John

>
> Many of the Warriors here have complained that they cannot do damage as
> fast
> as a Wizard.
>
> THEY ARE NOT SUPPOSED TO.
>
> Now all of you real life ninjas and steel sword swinging fools just calm
> down. Read carefully.
>
>
> Warriors get to wear platemail and have many more hps than a Wizard.
> Warriors also have a higher Offense, Defense, and Weapon skills. This all
> means that a Warrior can stand toe to toe against an NPC.
>
> Now lets make a Warrior have the same ability to deal damage as a Wizard.
> Now we would have a class that has the best armor, the highest combat
> skills, the most hp's AND the ability to deal the most damage.
>
> Why would anyone want to play a Wizard if a Warrior could do as much
> damage
> AND be able to take blows in melee?
>
>
> Wayne
> PS - When someone says that a Warrior should be able to deal as much
> damage
> as fast as a Wizard I immediately realize this person doesn't have a clue
> about game balance.
>
